column3:
Concept ACK :+1:

For reviewers ‚Äì use [`?w=1`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13210/files?w=1) to review ignoring whitespace changes.

To make this improvement persistent, please enable the `W291` check in `lint-python.sh`. That will make Travis catch any regressions.

Suggested patch:

```
diff --git a/contrib/devtools/lint-python.sh b/contrib/devtools/lint-python.sh
Please squash your commits according to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits
These commits could be script diffs?
@MarcoFalke why squash? These are independent unrelated. PR title could be improved.
Sorry for the spam üëº add Indentation contains tabs (W191) to lint?
Squashed and PR title has been updated now.  üëç
Hey @promag both W191 and W291 flake8 checks are now added üëç

Looks like the travis linter fails here, because tabs are used instead of spaces for indenting.\nWhich was already the case.\nTo match the style of the other files, I think you'd need to change tabs to four spaces throughout the file.
